content: in each of next 4 st slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join do not finish off 10 double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 11 single_crochet chain-2 / side round 13 slip_stitch to corner chain-2 chain 3 as 1st double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner chain-2 double_crochet in each of next 29 st x 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in corner chain-2 double_crochet in each of next 29 st slip_stitch to starting double_crochet to join finish off 33 double_crochet chain-2 / side round 14 with yarn a and beginning with a standing single_crochet single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in corner chain-2 single_crochet in each of next 33 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 35 single_crochet chain-2 / side round 15 with yarn b and beginning with a standing half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in corner chain-2 bphdc in each of next 35 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet to join finish off 35 bphdc 2 half_double_crochet chain-2 / side round 16 with yarn d and beginning with a standing single_crochet single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in corner chain-2 single_crochet in each of next 37 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 39 single_crochet chain-2 / side block if you wish if you decided to embroider the date in the centre do so now if you made a holly sprig add a few french dot embroidered berries to the holly sprig in yarn d happy christmas joseph s ladder wreath © 2023 lettice rose 5 joseph s ladder wreath © 2023 lettice rose 6 joseph s ladder wreath © 2023 lettice rose 7 joseph s ladder wreath © 2023 lettice rose 8
